languages.text: {n}Молодой человек в потертой рабочей робе держится непривычно изящно для простолюдина.{/n} "Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, я стою здесь уже два десятка лун, дабы получить разрешение на заключение брака с моей невестой, Зази. К сожалению, без подписи знатного поручителя служители {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратума{/g} отказываются..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Молодой человек в потертой рабочей робе держится непривычно изящно для простолюдина.{/n} "Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, я стою здесь уже два десятка лун, дабы получить разрешение на заключение брака с моей невестой, Зази. К сожалению, без подписи знатного поручителя служители {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратума{/g} отказываются..."
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: {n}The young man in worn work overalls comports himself with unusual grace for a commoner.{/n} "My {mf|lord|lady}, I have been in this queue for two dozen moons already, trying to get a permission slip to wed my fiancée Zazi. Unfortunately, the servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} refuse to grant it without the signature of a highborn sponsor..."

Unfortunately, the servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} refuse to grant it without the signature of a highborn sponsor..."
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: {n}这个年轻人穿着破旧的工作服。虽然他只是一介平民，但他的举止却异常优雅。{/n}“大人，我已经在这个队列里等了二十四个月了。我希望能得到一张许可，让我与我的未婚妻萨姿结婚。可遗憾的是，如果得不到来自贵族担保人的签名，{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}的仆人就不肯批准许可……”
languages.original_text: {n}The young man in worn work overalls comports himself with unusual grace for a commoner.{/n} "My {mf|lord|lady}, I have been in this queue for two dozen moons already, trying to get a permission slip to wed my fiancée Zazi. Unfortunately, the servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} refuse to grant it without the signature of a highborn sponsor..."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个年轻人穿着破旧的工作服。虽然他只是一介平民，但他的举止却异常优雅。{/n}“大人，我已经在这个队列里等了二十四个月了。我希望能得到一张许可，让我与我的未婚妻萨姿结婚。可遗憾的是，如果得不到来自贵族担保人的签名，{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}的仆人就不肯批准许可……”
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: {n}El hombre joven en mono de trabajo actúa con una elegancia impropia de un plebeyo.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, he pasado ya una veintena de lunas en esta cola, tratando de obtener un permiso para casarme con mi prometida, Zazi. Por desgracia, los sirvientes del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} se niegan a otorgarlo sin la firma de un garante noble...».
languages.original_text: {n}The young man in worn work overalls comports himself with unusual grace for a commoner.{/n} "My {mf|lord|lady}, I have been in this queue for two dozen moons already, trying to get a permission slip to wed my fiancée Zazi. Unfortunately, the servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} refuse to grant it without the signature of a highborn sponsor..."

Por desgracia, los sirvientes del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} se niegan a otorgarlo sin la firma de un garante noble...».
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: {n}すり切れた仕事着に身を包んだ若者は、一般市民にしては珍しく気品ある立ち居振る舞いをしている。{/n}「陛下、私はフィアンセのザジとの結婚許可書をいただきたく、この列にもう24月並んでいます。残念なことに、ハイボーンの後見人による署名がないとして{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}行政局{/g}の職員に認可を断られてまして…」
languages.original_text: {n}The young man in worn work overalls comports himself with unusual grace for a commoner.{/n} "My {mf|lord|lady}, I have been in this queue for two dozen moons already, trying to get a permission slip to wed my fiancée Zazi. Unfortunately, the servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} refuse to grant it without the signature of a highborn sponsor..."

traits.locale_text: {n}すり切れた仕事着に身を包んだ若者は、一般市民にしては珍しく気品ある立ち居振る舞いをしている。{/n}「陛下、私はフィアンセのザジとの結婚許可書をいただきたく、この列にもう24月並んでいます。残念なことに、ハイボーンの後見人による署名がないとして{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}行政局{/g}の職員に認可を断られてまして…」
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: {n}Le jeune homme en salopette usée fait preuve d'une aisance inhabituelle pour un vulgaire roturier.{/n} « {mf|Mon seigneur|Ma dame}, cela fait maintenant vingt-quatre lunes que je fais la queue dans l'espoir d'obtenir une permission afin d'épouser ma fiancée, Zazi. Malheureusement, les fonctionnaires de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} refusent de me l'accorder sans la signature d'un garant de noble extraction... »
languages.original_text: {n}The young man in worn work overalls comports himself with unusual grace for a commoner.{/n} "My {mf|lord|lady}, I have been in this queue for two dozen moons already, trying to get a permission slip to wed my fiancée Zazi. Unfortunately, the servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} refuse to grant it without the signature of a highborn sponsor..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le jeune homme en salopette usée fait preuve d'une aisance inhabituelle pour un vulgaire roturier.{/n} « {mf|Mon seigneur|Ma dame}, cela fait maintenant vingt-quatre lunes que je fais la queue dans l'espoir d'obtenir une permission afin d'épouser ma fiancée, Zazi. Malheureusement, les fonctionnaires de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} refusent de me l'accorder sans la signature d'un garant de noble extraction... »
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: {n}Der junge Mann im abgetragenen Arbeitsoverall benimmt sich ungewöhnlich gesittet für einen gewöhnlichen Bürger.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich stehe nun schon seit zwei Dutzend Monden in dieser Warteschlange, um die Erlaubnis zur Heirat meiner Verlobten Zazi zu erhalten. Leider verweigern das die Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} ohne die Unterschrift eines hochwohlgeborenen Gönners ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The young man in worn work overalls comports himself with unusual grace for a commoner.{/n} "My {mf|lord|lady}, I have been in this queue for two dozen moons already, trying to get a permission slip to wed my fiancée Zazi. Unfortunately, the servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} refuse to grant it without the signature of a highborn sponsor..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der junge Mann im abgetragenen Arbeitsoverall benimmt sich ungewöhnlich gesittet für einen gewöhnlichen Bürger.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich stehe nun schon seit zwei Dutzend Monden in dieser Warteschlange, um die Erlaubnis zur Heirat meiner Verlobten Zazi zu erhalten. Leider verweigern das die Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} ohne die Unterschrift eines hochwohlgeborenen Gönners ..."
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: {n}Yıpranmış bir iş tulumu giyen genç adam, avam halktan beklenmeyen bir hâl ve tavır takınıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lordum|Leydim}, nişanlım Zazi ile evlenmek için izin kâğıdı almaya bu kuyruğa gireli yirmi aydan fazla oldu. Ne yazık ki {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} hizmetkârları, kefil olacak bir soylunun imzası olmadan izin kâğıdı vermeyi reddediyor..."
